Comparison of MARC Serials, NSDP, and ISBD-S .A Pulsifer, Josephine S. Briefly characterizes and compares the specifications for serial records of the MAR Serials Distribution Service, the National Serials Data Program, and the International Standard Bibliographic Description for Serials.. Both data content and, where applicable, machine format are analyzed.. .X 18	1	877 127	1	877 141	1	877 145	1	877 244	1	877 299	1	877 333	1	877 357	1	877 365	1	877 376	1	877 449	1	877 459	1	877 524	1	877 525	1	877 527	1	877 529	2	877 530	2	877 534	1	877 541	1	877 553	1	877 628	1	877 630	1	877 633	1	877 635	1	877 636	1	877 637	1	877 642	1	877 702	1	877 703	1	877 730	1	877 732	1	877 733	1	877 734	1	877 736	1	877 802	1	877 819	1	877 822	1	877 826	1	877 827	1	877 854	1	877 871	1	877 872	1	877 873	1	877 874	2	877 875	1	877 876	1	877 877	6	877 878	4	877 879	2	877 880	1	877 892	1	877 904	1	877 919	1	877 920	1	877 921	1	877 940	2	877 941	2	877 990	1	877 992	1	877 993	1	877 994	1	877 995	1	877 997	1	877 998	1	877 999	1	877 1000	1	877 1001	1	877 1002	1	877 1003	1	877 1013	1	877 1079	2	877 1143	1	877 1216	1	877 1230	1	877 1257	1	877 1303	1	877 1370	1	877 1372	1	877 1383	1	877 1396	2	877 1421	1	877 1434	1	877 1435	2	877 1436	3	877 1436	3	877
